post0.title: Open a GitHub Blog in 10 minutes (part 1)
post0.content: Go to the fastpages GitHub repository, click setup instructions | Click â€˜on this linkâ€™ | Create a repository | . | Wait until the â€˜Pull Requestâ€™ is done in your repository . | Click Initial setup and follow the directions. Generate SSH key-pair: RSA, 4096 Click to generate secret and deploy keys | Copy â€˜Private Keyâ€™ and paste it to the secret key (Name: SSH_DEPLOY_KEY) | Copy the â€˜Public Keyâ€™ and paste it to the deploy key. | . | Click Merge pull request below Initial setup description . | After 2 minutes or so, you can see your blog address at your repositoryâ€™s README.md |

post1.title: PHP & Apache Initial Setup on macOS
post1.content: Start PHP on macOS . macOS has PHP and apache (apachectl) installed by default. However, if you look at the httpd.conf file, it says PHP has been removed from macOS 12 version. â€œPHP was deprecated in macOS 11 and removed from macOS 12â€ (/etc/apache2/httpd.conf) Therefore, we need some prep work to run PHP and apache servers on Mac. . PHP installation â€˜'â€™bash brew install php@8.0 â€˜â€™â€™ . | httpd(apache) installation â€˜'â€™bash brew install httpd â€˜â€™â€™ . | Modifying the httpd.conf file . file find command $find â€˜Find Pathâ€™ â€˜Formatâ€™ â€œâ€˜File Nameâ€™.extensionâ€ â€˜'â€™bash find / -name â€œhttpd.confâ€ â€˜â€™â€™ | Go to the folder where httpd is installed â€˜'â€™bash cd /opt/homebrew/etc/httpd â€˜â€™â€™ | Open the httpd.conf file as admin (enter the password) â€˜'â€™bash sudo vi httpd.conf â€˜â€™â€™ | Modify httpd.conf - Line 53 -> Change to Listen 80 - Line 182 -> Uncomment LoadModule rewrite_module lib/httpd/modules/mod_rewrite.so - Add LoadModule php_module /opt/homebrew/opt/php@8.0/lib/httpd/modules/libphp.so to the bottom line.(path installed in brew install php) - Line 195 -> Change User Username - Line 196 -> Change to Group staff - Line 217 -> Change to ServerAdmin localhost - Line 250 -> Change to DocumentRoot â€œProject Pathâ€ - Line 251 -> Change to <Directory â€œProject Pathâ€> - Line 271 -> Change to Allow Override All - add to the bottom line - AddType application/x-httpd-php .html .php - AddType application/x-httpd-php-source .phps - PHPIniDir /etc - Save (:wq) | . |
